mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO T_UDMP_BATCH_JOB_RUN_LOG( JOB_RUN_LOG_ID, LOG_TIME, LOG_INFO, LOG_LEVEL, LOG_TYPE, JOB_RUN_ID ) VALUES ( #{job_run_log_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE() , #{log_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{log_level, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{log_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{job_run_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.JOB_RUN_LOG_ID, A.LOG_TIME, A.LOG_INFO, A.LOG_LEVEL, A.LOG_TYPE, A.JOB_RUN_ID FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_JOB_RUN_LOG A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT A.JOB_RUN_LOG_ID, A.LOG_TIME, A.LOG_INFO, A.LOG_LEVEL, A.LOG_TYPE, A.JOB_RUN_ID FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_JOB_RUN_LOG A WHERE 1=1
limit 1000

SELECT A.JOB_RUN_LOG_ID, A.LOG_TIME, A.LOG_INFO, A.LOG_LEVEL, A.LOG_TYPE, A.JOB_RUN_ID FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_JOB_RUN_LOG A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.JOB_RUN_LOG_ID limit 1000
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_JOB_RUN_LOG A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT A.JOB_RUN_LOG_ID, A.LOG_TIME, A.LOG_INFO, A.LOG_LEVEL, A.LOG_TYPE, A.JOB_RUN_ID FROM T_UDMP_BATCH_JOB_RUN_LOG A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.JOB_RUN_LOG_ID
